mapper.select: SELECT keep.* , lod.lodging_name, lod.addr, pho.photo, re.clean_grade, re.accuracy_grade, re.communication_grade, re.location_grade, re.check_in_grade, re.cost_grade FROM keeping keep JOIN lodging lod ON keep.lodging_num = lod.lodging_num JOIN photo pho ON keep.lodging_num = pho.lodging_num JOIN review re ON keep.user_id = re.user_id WHERE keep.user_id = "tester2" and keep.delete_yn = 'N'

SELECT avg(cast(clean_grade as float)) as clean_grade, avg(cast(accuracy_grade as float)) as accuracy_grade, avg(cast(communication_grade as float)) as communication_grade, avg(cast(location_grade as float)) as location_grade, avg(cast(check_in_grade as float)) as check_in_grade, avg(cast(cost_grade as float)) as cost_grade, round((clean_grade + accuracy_grade + communication_grade + location_grade + check_in_grade + cost_grade) / 6, 1) as review_total, count(*) as review_count FROM review WHERE lodging_num = #{lodgingNum} AND deleted_yn = 'N'
